TITLE: Episode 27 - The Truth Disciple
DESCRIPTION: Maddie and Jessie talk to The Truth Disciple about history and racism. Truth gives his background as a podcaster and his pursuit of truth, his namesake. Be prepared to learn about racism from a perspective that you wouldn’t expect.
